com.sf298.genericwebserver

Class UserManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sf298.genericwebserver.UserManager

  • public class UserManager
extends Object
    Performs all the passwords checking and token handling for users.
    Author:
    saud

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      HashMap<Integer,String> tokens

      Creates a new user manager instance

    • Field Detail

      • tokens

        public final HashMap<Integer,String> tokens

    • Constructor Detail

      • UserManager

        public UserManager(boolean scanUserFile,
                   String hashSalt,
                   String fileEncryptorKey)
        Creates a new user manager instance.
        Parameters:
        scanUserFile - Whether to scan for changes in the users file every 10 sec.
        hashSalt - The salt to use when hashing the passwords.
        fileEncryptorKey - The key to use when encrypting the save file. If null, the file is not encrypted.

      • UserManager

        public UserManager(File usersFile,
                   boolean scanUserFile,
                   String hashSalt,
                   String fileEncryptorKey)
        Creates a new user manager instance
        Parameters:
        usersFile - The file path to store the usernames and password hashes
        scanUserFile - Whether to scan for changes in the users file every 10 sec.
        hashSalt - The salt to use when hashing the passwords.
        fileEncryptorKey - The key to use when encrypting the save file. If null, the file is not encrypted.

    • Method Detail

      • stop

        public void stop()

      • loadUserData

        public void loadUserData()
        Loads data from the users file.

      • checkPasswordHash

        public boolean checkPasswordHash(String uname,
                                 String unsaltedHash)
        Checks if the provided password matches the password stored.
        Parameters:
        uname - The unique username for the user.
        unsaltedHash - The password, unsalted and pre-hashed with SHA-256.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the password matches the stored password.

      • addUser

        public void addUser(String uname,
                    String unsaltedHash)
        Add a new user to the manager. If the user exists, changes the previously stored password.
        Parameters:
        uname - the username
        unsaltedHash - the password, unsalted and pre-hashed with SHA-256

      • removeUser

        public void removeUser(String uname)
        Remove a user from the manager.
        Parameters:
        uname - The username.

      • newToken

        public int newToken(String uname)
        Get a new token for the given username.
        Parameters:
        uname - A username that exists in the manager.
        Returns:
        returns the new token, or -1 if the user does not exist.

      • checkToken

        public boolean checkToken(int token)
        Checks if a token has been issued.
        Parameters:
        token -
        Returns:

      • getUser

        public String getUser(int token)
        Gets the username associated with the given token.
        Parameters:
        token -
        Returns:
        The username of the associated user.

      • clearTokens

        public void clearTokens()
        Removes all stored tokens.

      • logout

        public void logout(int token)
        Removes the selected token.
        Parameters:
        token - The token to remove.

      • logoutUser

        public void logoutUser(int token)
        Logs out all tokens issued to a given user.
        Parameters:
        token - Any token issued to the user.

      • logoutUser

        public void logoutUser(String uname)
        Logs out all tokens issued to a given user.
        Parameters:
        uname - The username.
